content.description:
Architecture and development of single-page applications with JavaScript, TypeScript, Angular (8.x.x), NgRx/Redux, CSS/SASS, HTML5. Design and development of API applications with Node.js and Salesforce (Apex).

Use of Jenkins for continuous integration. Worked closely with product owners to define and track deliverables on the roadmap.

Responsible for the architecture of presentation tier as part of a company-wide effort to move from a monolithic web application to service-oriented architecture.

As part of my new role, I was responsible for designing, building and maintaining a new UI library with shared components to be used by all the Angular web applications within Sage People.

Part of a team responsible for the design and development of the Cloud SaaS CRM product.

Front end development using AngularJS (1.6), Angular (7.x.x), JavaScript, TypeScript, RxJS, Redux, CSS3 (Less/SASS), HTML5 and Karma/Jasmine for unit testing. Back end development using technologies such Apex, Salesforce.

I was part of a small team of 4 developers responsible for the analysis and development of applications essentially for web, participating in the full cycle of software development, using technologies such as PHP, Laravel/Codeigniter, MySQL, JavaScript, Web Services, jQuery, HTML5, CSS3.
I was responsible for analyzing and development of web applications using technologies such as PHP, MySQL, Codeigniter, JavaScript, jQuery, HTML5, CSS3/SASS.

I was responsible for the architecture and design of Brotideal e-commerce applications as other internal software of the company, participating in the front end and back development using technologies such as PHP, MySQL, JavaScript/jQuery, HTML, CSS
